text: 18.19 1 Sml 4.12, Ese 27.30-34 Sɨlkul dɨl, kɨmɨg adek kɨli alaŋ dɨyokɨlɨg, chɨb gek chaŋ lɨlɨg suk awl agɨl agɨnɨgabal, Mel o, mel o agɨnɨgabal agak. Taun kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl anɨb ak, mɨñɨl pɨsnep tɨmel gup agɨnɨgabal agak. Ne mɨdaknɨŋ, gol mani tap okok kuŋay yɨbɨl yek, sip gɨ ajɨlɨg tap kuŋay yɨbɨl dɨpal ak pen, mɨñɨl yep won awl nep, tap teplep anɨb okok mɨdupsek pɨsnep kul gup agɨnɨgabal agak.
